description:
Though badly outnumbered, the Mud Whale`s defenders continue to fight valiantly. Ouni and Nibi make a last stand against the Imperial forces.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Chcę zobaczyć, dokąd zaprowadzi cię twój wybór
I Want to See Where Your Choice Leads
Kimi no Sentaku no, Sono Saki ga Mitai
君の選択の, その先が見たい
